titles.title: Since Jesus Came Into My Heart

authors.author: Charles H. Gabriel Rufus H. McDaniel

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Since Jesus came into my heart,
Since Jesus came into my heart,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Floods of joy o'er my soul
like the sea billows roll,
Since Jesus came into my heart.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
What a wonderful change
in my life has been wrought
Since Jesus came into my heart!

verse.name: v1b
v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
And my sins which were many
are all washed away,
Since Jesus came into my heart.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
And the gates of the city
beyond I can see,
Since Jesus came into my heart.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
And I'm happy, so happy,
as onward I go,
Since Jesus came into my heart.

verse.name: v5a
v5b
verse.lines:
And no dark clouds of doubt
now my pathway obscure,
Since Jesus came into my heart.
